meta.job_title: Lead Program Manager of Infrastructure Investments

duties_responsibilities.duty: Research, prepare, submit, and manage grant proposals/reports
Drive the development of infrastructure projects and oversee grant proposal submission and implementation
Monitor and track funding opportunity announcements
Maintain relationships with funding agencies, regulatory agencies, and other strategic partners
Maintain grant compliance and reporting, including outcome measurement and grant budgets
Coordinate response to requests for information from external agencies or regulators
Establish processes required to manage grants once received

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business administration, engineering, liberal arts or similar – advanced degree is preferred
